app.title: YA-WAMF
app.tagline: AI-powered bird classification for your Frigate NVR

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.waiting_first_visitor: Waiting for the first visitor of the day...

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure and manage your YA-WAMF instance
settings.language_desc: Changes UI text and notification content.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Options
accessibility.dyslexia_font_desc: Use OpenDyslexic font for better readability
accessibility.zen_mode_desc: Simplify interface to reduce cognitive load

telemetry.title: Telemetry
telemetry.desc: Help improve YA-WAMF by sharing anonymous usage stats.
telemetry.privacy_notice: This data is sent securely to help us understand how the app is used. No images or personal detection data are ever shared.

notifications.reclassify_fallback: ‚ö†Ô∏è Video not available - snapshot used instead

leaderboard.title: Species Leaderboard
leaderboard.no_species_desc: Bird detections will appear here once they're recorded
leaderboard.unidentified_desc: Unidentified detection - click to review and reclassify

about.title: About This Project
about.built_with_ai: Built with AI assistance for the love of bird watching üê¶
about.project_desc_1: YA-WAMF is a personal project started to experiment with AI-assisted coding. When the original {link} project became unmaintained, this was born as both a learning opportunity and a useful tool for bird enthusiasts.
about.project_desc_2: The entire application has been built with help from AI coding assistants - it's been an interesting exploration of what's possible with these tools. If you spot any rough edges, that's probably why!

1.title: Frigate Detects
1.desc: Your camera picks up movement, Frigate identifies it as a bird

2.title: MQTT Message
2.desc: Frigate publishes an event to your MQTT broker

3.title: YA-WAMF Processes
3.desc: The backend subscribes to MQTT and picks up the event

4.title: Classification
4.desc: Image runs through ML model (or uses Frigate's sublabel)

5.title: Audio Correlation
5.desc: Cross-references with BirdNET-Go audio detections if available

6.title: Save & Notify
6.desc: Detection stored to database, notifications sent

7.title: Video Analysis
7.desc: Optional: Scans video clip frames for refined accuracy

8.title: Live Updates
8.desc: Dashboard receives real-time updates via Server-Sent Events

ai_models.title: Advanced AI Models
ai_models.desc: Choose from MobileNetV2 (fast), ConvNeXt (high accuracy), or EVA-02 (elite ~91% accuracy)

multi_sensor.title: Multi-Sensor Correlation
multi_sensor.desc: Cross-reference visual detections with BirdNET-Go audio identifications for verified sightings

video_analysis.title: Auto Video Analysis
video_analysis.desc: Automatically scan 15+ frames from video clips for higher accuracy using temporal ensemble logic

notifications.title: Rich Notifications
notifications.desc: Discord, Telegram, and Pushover support with customizable filters and species-specific alerts

ai_insights.title: AI Naturalist Insights
ai_insights.desc: Get behavioral analysis of your visitors using Gemini, OpenAI, or Claude language models

taxonomy.title: Taxonomy Normalization
taxonomy.desc: Automatic scientific ‚Üî common name mapping using iNaturalist data

weather.title: Weather Enrichment
weather.desc: Track detections with local weather conditions and temperature data

home_assistant.title: Home Assistant Integration
home_assistant.desc: Native sensors for tracking last detected bird and daily visitor counts

birdweather.title: BirdWeather Reporting
birdweather.desc: Optional: Contribute your detections to the BirdWeather community science platform

observability.title: Observability
observability.desc: Built-in Prometheus metrics, optional telemetry, and real-time MQTT diagnostics

wildlife.title: Wildlife Classifier
wildlife.desc: Identify squirrels, foxes, and other non-bird visitors to your feeder

fast_path.title: Fast Path Efficiency
fast_path.desc: Skip local AI processing and use Frigate's sublabels directly to save CPU resources

links.docs_desc: Setup guides, API reference, and troubleshooting
links.frigate_desc: Required: Open-source NVR with object detection

credits_list.preamble: This project wouldn't be possible without:
credits_list.inspiration: The original {link} project for the inspiration
credits_list.frigate: {link} for being an excellent open-source NVR
credits_list.benjordan: {link} on YouTube for inspiring bird detection content
credits_list.ai_assistants: AI assistants that helped build this application

species_detail.no_wiki: No Wikipedia information available for this species.
